Sorry, rAuq. I got confused.

::Firearm/Kluster::

Firearm continued flying upwards, feeling shot after shot hit his 
legs. His armor took most of it, but the pain was still felt. 
Firearm's jetpack worked harder as the gravity increased, but he 
still managed to clear the ash and blast up toward the sky.

"Eat this!" he yells, firing three charges down at Dead-End, Drag 
Strip, and Skullgrin.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster gets up, shaking ash off of himself from the shuttle 
explosion. He picks a bot on his scanners and fires two missiles at 
Dead-End.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::??::
> 
>        A pod lands quickly, and oddly, near the Cybertronian Fire.  
Out steps a robot in perfect shape, and appearing really frightening 
and monstrous.
> 
>        "Skullgrin is back!!!!" He said in triumph.
> 
>         Skullgrin then heard the battle.  He peeked at what was 
going on.
> 
>          "My Decepticon comrades!  I don't believe this at all!" He 
yelled to himself.
> 
>           Skullgrin ran out onto the battlefield, silently, then 
transformed into his shrapnel-blasting assault tank mode, and fired 2 
shots at Firearm.
> 
>            "Die Autobot!" He yelled.
